bibl.title: P. Harr. 107: Is this another Greek Manichaean Letter?
bibl.note: Argue that P. Harris I, 107, long considered one of the earliest Christian letters on papyrus from Egypt, has been both misdated and misclassified as regards the religious affiliation of its writer. The letter should be assigned a date in the late third or early fourth century; Manichaen authorship is probable. Greek text, translation and commentary.
GARDNER Iain, Alanna NOBBS and Malcolm CHOAT, P. Harr. 107: Is this another Greek Manichaean Letter?
